fields.name: showIndicators
fields.label: Show Indicators
fields.description: Toggle the visibility of navigation indicators.

fields.name: showControls
fields.label: Show Controls
fields.description: Toggle the visibility of previous and next controls.

fields.name: NumberSlides
fields.label: Number of Slides
fields.description: Specify the total number of slides in the carousel.

fields.name: dataInterval
fields.label: Interval Between Slides
fields.description: Set the time interval (in milliseconds) between automatic slide transitions.

fields.name: carouselFade
fields.label: Fade Transition
fields.description: Use a fade effect instead of sliding between slides.

fields.name: carouselAutoPlay
fields.label: Autoplay Carousel
fields.description: Automatically start transitioning slides when the carousel loads.
